import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './Login.css'; export default function Login({ onNavigate }) { const [email, setEmail] = useState(''); const [password, setPassword] = useState(''); const [rememberMe, setRememberMe] = useState(false); const [showPassword, setShowPassword] = useState(false); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Handle login logic here console.log('Login:', { email, password, rememberMe }); }; return (
